features: Trial Size 4-Ounce Bottle: Whether you are traveling and need a convenient size to bring along or you're new to Heritage Park and simply want to try it out (we understand commitment can be tough), with our highly concentrated formula, just a tablespoon is all you need to hand wash your favorite items.

All Natural Lavender Scent - Bring a little calm to laundry day with our lightly fragranced Lavender Mist Laundry Detergent. Fragranced with only all-natural lavender oil, this subtle, airy scent provides a refreshing floral aroma that won't overwhelm.

Specially Formulated: Gently and effectively clean your clothing, lingerie, bedding, and more. Our eco-friendly laundry detergent is perfect for all your protein-based fabrics; silk, wool, cashmere, alpaca, camel, llama, washable furs, and more. Made with plant-based ingredients, this detergent is pH neutral, and safe for skin and fabrics.

Safe for Delicate Fabrics: Our pH-neutral, enzyme-free Silk and Wool Laundry Detergents contain No Dyes, No Sulfates, No Phosphates, No Optical Brighteners, No Chlorine Bleach, and No Caustic Chemicals.

People and Planet Safe: We produce our liquid laundry detergent in small batches using thoughtfully sourced ingredients to ensure the quality of our products. We intentionally choose only safe, hardworking, natural and naturally-derived ingredients. This delicate, low-sudsing machine or hand washing detergent is safe for people and the planet. Proudly made in the USA.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The ultimate detergent to gently—yet effectively—clean your silk, wool, cashmere, & other natural fibers without causing damage. Our concentrated, enzyme-free soap contains powerful, plant-based ingredients formulated especially for natural fibers. Preserve your laundered luxuries for years to come.

Previous page Gentle & Effective Safe for your protein-based fabrics Our pH Neutral, non-bio detergent is the ideal choice for washing silk, wool, cashmere, & more! 9 Ingredient Formula Safe & Effective to Clean Without Damage We’re proud of our short list of ingredients and only add what’s necessary to get your items clean. Lavender Essential Oil Subtle Scented Detergent What Won't Overwhelm Our Lavender Mist Detergent is scented with only all-natural lavender essential oil, that's it! Only What's Necessary Thoughtfully Sourced Ingredients Only high-quality, safe ingredients go into our detergents, making them safe for the whole family. Family-Owned & Operated Small Batches for Maximum Quality Control Your family deserves laundry detergent made from the finest, kindest & safest ingredients on Earth. Next page 1 Enzyme-Free Formula 2 Plant-Based 3 Light, Natural Fragrance 4 No Harsh Chemicals 5 Made in the USA

What types of fabrics can this be used with? Use our Silk & Wool detergent with any protein-based fabric, as well as relaxed linens. It can also be used with other fabrics, but our All-Purpose option is best for cotton, polyester, and bamboo that don’t require an enzyme-free formula. How much do I use? Hand Wash – Use 1/3 cap (32oz bottle) / 1 tbsp / .5 oz per sink full of water (or 2-3 gallons if using a basin) High Efficiency (HE) Machine – Use one full cap / 3 tbsp / 1.5 oz. Standard Machine - Use 1-1/2 Caps / 4.5 tbsp / 2.25 oz What does this detergent smell like? Our lavender Mist detergent is lightly fragranced only with all-natural lavender essential oil. So, it smells like... lavender! That's it. Not too strong, just a touch so it won't overwhelm your senses. Subtle, floral, fresh, and soothing. Why is a pH Neutral Detergent important? A neutral pH laundry detergent like Heritage Park protects delicate fabrics that can be damaged by a soap that is too acidic or alkaline. It's also safer for sensitive skin that can be irritated by a detergent with a high pH. Where are your products made? Heritage Park is a small business based in Connecticut. Our detergents are made in NY at our family-owned & operated bottler. Our detergents are made in small batches to maximize quality control and ensure your product never sits on a shelf for long.

Choose from 3 Size Options 4 Ounce Trial Sample A perfect size for travel or if you're just looking to try it out. Up to 8 WashesOnly 1 Tablespoon is needed for Hand Washing your delicate items. 32 Ounce Easy-Pour Bottle Our new easy-pour bottle eliminated the mess and makes measuring simple. Up to 64 LoadsUse just one capful for a HE Machine with a regular load. 64 Ounce Refill Pack Our Refill packs save plastic and make refilling your 32oz bottles easy. Up to 128 LoadsRefill your 32oz easy-pour bottle two times. 64 Ounce Bottle These bottles have limited stock as we are in the process of re-designing - expected late spring. Up to 128 LoadsCurrently include a measuring scoop.

Subscribe & Save Who wants to think about buying more Laundry Detergent? Your favorite laundry detergent can show up at your door like magic! Well, not magic exactly… but with Amazon Subscribe & Save you can receive up to 15% off and never have to think about when you have to re-order.

About Heritage Park Proudly Made in the USA At Heritage Park, caring for fine fabric is our passion. As lifelong collectors of luxury clothing and home linens, we found many commercially available "gentle detergents" either damaged our fabrics or didn't get the job done. We knew we could do better. We developed a formula with the perfect balance of powerful - yet safe - ingredients designed to gently, and effectively clean. Family-owned & Operated CompanyDetergents are all produced in Small Batches for Maximum Quality Control Hypoallergenic Third-Party Lab Tested All of our fragrance free detergents are third-party, lab tested to be hypoallergenic and non-irritating to even the most sensitive skin. These liquid detergents are also dermatologist- and pediatrician- tested - perfect for all ages, even newborns. Ingredients Transparency & Trust are essential to our mission. Your family washes clothes and bedding with our detergent, which comes into direct contact with your skin. As a result, we believe you have a right to know exactly what our products are made of. Our detergents are pH-neutral & certified cruelty-free by Leaping Bunny. You won’t find harsh chemicals, dyes, brighteners, or nonsense here. You can learn about what goes into our products on our website where we explain each ingredient, what it's made from, and what it does. Silk & Wool Detergent For Washing Silk, Wool, Cashmere, Furs, and other Natural Protein-Based Fabrics Available in Hypoallergenic Fragrance Free, and Naturally Fragranced Lavender Mist & Spring Magnolia. Designed for delicate fabrics, our pH-neutral formulas are gentle and safe for both your fabrics and sensitive skin. Use to hand or machine wash your favorite, delicate clothing, lingerie, bedding, home linens, and more! Our ultra-concentrated, low-sudsing formula can be used with for HE, front-load, & traditional top-loading washing machines. All-Purpose Laundry Detergents The Perfect Blend of Gentle, yet Effective, Cleaning Power Available in Hypoallergenic Fragrance Free or lightly scented Shore Breeze, Lavender Mist, or Spring Magnolia options. SIX powerful cleaning enzymes and plant-based ingredients make our All-Purpose detergents capable of removing odors and set-in stains while remaining gentle on your favorite items. Use our ultra-concentrated, low-sudsing formulas to hand or machine wash clothing, bedding, and home textiles made of cotton, polyester, bamboo, and wood fiber fabrics, activewear, and more! Essentials Laundry Accessories Protect Your Fine Washables Even Further Our Fine Mesh Laundry Bags are specially designed with a gusseted bottom for extra space to allow your items to move freely. Made from premium micro-mesh, they keep your items safe from snags. Our All-Natural Wool Dryer Balls are the perfect chemical-free solution for drying your towels, clothing, & favorite linens. Using wool dryer balls can shorten drying times and help prevent wrinkles. All without any of the harsh chemicals found in fabric softener or dryer sheets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very lovely soap for silk sheets, leaves them smelling lightly lavender, definitely worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For My Silk
reviews.reviewText: I’ve only used it once so far and love the feel of my silk! No harsh odor, just clean and fresh!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with this product. It is absolutely fragrance free, which was very important to me. I washed a scarf with it and it cleans well and rinses easily.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Smells Great, Cleans Okay
reviews.reviewText: I followed directions found online for how to wash silk with this product and I don't agree that the genteel approach to clean the tougher spots of my pillow-cases. It didn't remove the drool-spots, but the scent was lovely to lie on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive but worth it
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is the only thing that I will wash my silk sheets with and my sheets are still in great quality 1.5 years later. If you spend $200-300 on nice things, might as well keep them nice, ya know!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Smell so good
reviews.reviewText: I like the smell so much! And It really works on my hair!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very easy on the silk 👌
reviews.reviewText: Good price/quantity. It bottle was smaller than expected, but it will last a while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Effective but pricey
reviews.reviewText: Works and smells great but was really expensive such that I’ll be looking for alternatives.

Opened the cap and there was no inner seal. Not sure if it was a return but all the liquid was there right to the top. It makes me wonder if it's actually the correct product though as it's the first time I bought it. I used it on some silk pillowcases I have and it seemed to be ok. Not sure if there usually is a seal or if I had a unique situation. Good size though and stores easily.
seems the same as much cheaper delicates laundry soap, Small compact bottle perfect for traveling

reviews.reviewTitle: I was shocked for the size comparing the price I paid for!
reviews.reviewText: I haven't used it yet but was absolutely shocked this morning when I received it. As it says that for a standard wash would need 1/2 bottle, so It will only be able to do two washes. I think It needs to be magically good for me to accept that price. I know it's my own bad that I didn't check carefully for the size and all the reviews, but still feeling that I was misled by the photos and description.
Arrived frozen… after thawing seems fine.

reviews.reviewTitle: The bottle is so small I have trouble finding it
reviews.reviewText: Very little product for the price
